summary: Email exchange between defense attorney Roy Black and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding scheduling a discussion about the performance of Jeffrey Epstein's criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: Addressee of an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney seeking to discuss the Jeffrey Epstein matter; indicates he is out of town.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the email discussion regarding the performance of his criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement.

connections.description: Roy Black is being contacted to discuss matters related to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a legal representation or advisory role.

events.title: Scheduled Discussion on Epstein NPA
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney attempts to schedule a discussion with defense attorney Roy Black regarding the performance of Jeffrey Epstein's criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: The email concerns the 'performance of the criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement' related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication is between a defense attorney (Roy Black) and an Assistant U.S. Attorney in July 2008.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney's office is located in West Palm Beach, Florida, which is the jurisdiction for the Epstein case.
